flawed_nl_solution:
There are a total of 10 x 30 = <<10*30=300>>300 pieces of oranges in a truck.
A total of 50 + 30 = <<50+30=60>>60 pieces of oranges will not be sold.
Thus, 300 - 60 = <<300-60=240>>240 pieces of oranges will be sold.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
